was palpable. Here it was, the come-from-behind drive that longtime franchise quarterback Donovan McNabb had failed to produce so many times. Michael Vick had his chance. ''We were very confident,'' Michael Vick said. We thought we were going to win the game. I thought we were going to win the game. I had an upbeat feeling about myself. I felt like I was in control. Michael Vick overthrew tight end Brent Celek on first down. He threw wide of running back LeSean McCoy on second down.
